name: Code Review - Dashboard Component Refactoring
content: Jordan requested code review from Alex for dashboard refactor. Identified 450-line DataVisualization component as overly complex 'God component' handling data fetching, transformation, rendering, and state management. Alex suggested architectural improvements: extract data fetching into custom hook (useVisualizationData), move transformation logic to utility function, return loading/error states from hook. Jordan recognized the pattern and committed to refactoring before PR submission. Alex praised the chart library integration work that Sam helped with. Collaborative problem-solving with constructive feedback.
summary: Code review: identified God component problem, planned refactor using custom hooks and utility functions
